original_text: Therefore they shall be as the morning cloud and as the early dew that passeth away, as the chaff that is driven with the whirlwind out of the floor, and as the smoke out of the chimney.
korean_text: 이러므로 그들은 아침 구름 같으며 쉬 사라지는 이슬 같으며 타작 마당에서 광풍에 날리는 쭉정이 같으며 굴뚝에서 나가는 연기 같으리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore they shall be as the morning cloud
and as the early dew that passeth away
as the chaff that is driven with the whirlwind out of the floor
and as the smoke out of the chimney
